resources.string: The best fitness app in the century to accompany your lifestyle
To give you a better experience and results we need to know your gender
Age in years. This will help us to personalize an exercise program that suits you.
Don\'t worry you can always change it later, or you can skip it for now
Choose your regular activity level.This will help us to personalize plans for you
You can choose more than one. Don\'t worry you can always change it later
Height in cm. Don\'t worry you can always change it later.
Weight in kg. Don\'t worry you can always change it later.
Age in years. This will help us to personalize an exercise program plan that suits you.
